note.p: Death: Grange over Sands, Lancashire (06 January 1921)
Education: Manchester Grammar School; Balliol College, Oxford. MA

Career: Fellow of University College, Oxford; Millard Lecturer on Physics, Trinity College, Oxford; Junior Demonstrator, Clarendon Laboratory, Oxford; Senior University Mathematical Scholar (1876); Examiner in the Natural Science Schools, Oxford and Cambridge; Keeper of the Mineralogical Department, British Museum (1880-1909); died of heart disease
Memberships: FGS; FCS; Physical Society; Mineralogical Society (President)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1921 vol 99 pp ix-xii, plate, signed by A L
